Windows Laptops

.....Our unbeatable range of Windows Laptops includes the industry’s leading brands. Browse our range of Dell, HP, Lenovo, Microsoft, Samsung & PC Specialist laptops. Choosing the right Laptop for you can be difficult. We help you get it right – with advice on the ideal laptops for gaming, work, social and casual use, full spec details to compare laptops & our easy to use laptop buying guide.

Macbooks

Cutting edge design & functionality, Apple Macbooks have it all. Suitable for home and work use, Macbooks always deliver. Each Macbook released arrives with further innovation. We stock the full range, including Macbook Pro, Macbook Air and the ultra-thin Macbook.

Chromebooks

A new breed of innovative laptops with a wide appeal. Chromebooks run on Chrome OS and are specifically designed to use with cloud-based applications. Chromebooks are renowned for their affordability, high battery life and their inclination for web based apps over desktop applications.

 

Gamers, workers, students, creators – whoever you are, and whatever you need a laptop for, you’ll find your ideal match in our vast collection.

Portability. Convenience. Enjoy all this with your pick from our range of cheap laptops. But that’s not all. We’ve got devices that’ll keep going throughout that epic study session with all-day battery life. Thin and lightweight models that are easy to carry to all those business meetings. Touchscreens to make social media scrolling a breeze. And those with DVD drives, so you can watch your disc collection at your leisure.

Looking for a gaming laptop ? We’ve got plenty of top choices, with powerful GPU to deliver the quality of graphics you need for your gameplay. Or what about a 2-in-1 model from the likes of Acer, Asus, HP, Lenovo and Samsung? These clever gadgets operate as standard machines with keyboards to type on, but also transform into tablet-style touchscreens for the best of both worlds. You’ll find devices with that kind of flexibility in our Dell laptops range, which also features models perfect for business, entertainment and games, too.

 

Whether you want a Microsoft Surface laptop operating on Windows 10, an Apple laptop using MacOS, or a Chromebook with ChromeOS, we’ve got all operating systems covered. The same goes for processors, with Intel Core, AMD Ryzen and more options available. Keep it compact with a 10-inch screen size, or spread out with 17.3 inches. With memory up to 32GB RAM and storage capacity up to 2TB, these mini machines can pack a powerful punch. Who needs a desktop, anyway?

Our laptop deals make it easy to find a device to work with your budget, so browse our full range today and pick your perfect partner in ‘take it with you’ tech.
